Parallel Curve (through Point)

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw > Ellipse > Parallel Curve (through Point)
Shortcut: E, G
Commands: ellipseoffsetthrough | eg

Description:

With this tool you can create curves that are parallel to an ellipse and go through a specified point.

Procedure:

  1. Enter the number of parallel curves to create in the options toolbar.
  2. Click the base ellipse.
  3. Click the location through which the first parallel curve should go.
